title: Indonesia to Probe Stock Price Manipulation After Market Rout
description: Indonesia said it will crack down on stock manipulators and accelerate financial reforms as authorities step up efforts to restore confidence in its asset markets.
content: Indonesia said it will crack down on stock manipulators and accelerate financial reforms as authorities step up efforts to restore confidence in its asset markets.
